body:
Found the reason why ssl verification fails on my arm server, here is the hint if someone sees this kind of issue:
when I use openssl verify to try my arm server from my working PC, I got error like this:
alert bad certificate:s3_pkt.c:1487:SSL alert number 42

Please check the date on both server and client. When generating the certificate, we set a valid period with 3650 or something. Client and server will consider it as a bad certificate if it is expired by checking the clock on host.

Close this issue.
Thanks
